Class UI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.UI
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLI, GUI
public abstract class UI
extends java.lang.Object
A generic user interface.

      Parameters:
      message - the error message

    • notifyError

      public void notifyError​(java.lang.Exception ex)
      Displays an error on the user interface. Please, be aware that this function is not intended to display debug messages to developers, but to render nicely-formatted error messages to the end user, hoping that they will be useful to her/him in order to identify what she/he did wrong.
      Parameters:
      ex - the exception

    • notifyError

      public void notifyError​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Exception ex)
      Displays an error on the user interface.
      Parameters:
      message - the error message
      ex - the exception
